# incrementalSearchingShouldDimContentView

**Instance Property**

Determines the type of incremental search feedback to be presented

## Declaration

```swift
var incrementalSearchingShouldDimContentView: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], then when an incremental search begins, the `findBarContainer` instance’s parent `contentView` will be dimmed, except for the locations of the incremental matches. If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], then the incremental matches will not be highlighted automatically, but you can use incrementalMatchRanges to highlight the matches yourself.

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Incremental Search Configuration

- **drawIncrementalMatchHighlight(in:)**: Override this method to draw custom highlighting.
- **incrementalMatchRanges**: Array of incremental search matches posted on the main queue, which have been found during a background search.
- **isIncrementalSearchingEnabled**: Determines if incremental searching is enabled.
